    • initialize

      public void initialize(URL arg0, ResourceBundle arg1)
      Initializes the screen. Receiving all machines locations from server. The method fill all elements on the screen: set texts and combo boxes ready to use.
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
      Parameters:
      arg0 - the location of the root object
      arg1 - the resources used to localize the root object

    • clickBackButton

      void clickBackButton(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent event)
      Set the right window when clicking back button. It refers to previous screen depends on role.
      Parameters:
      event - the mouse event that triggered the method call

    • clickOnType

      void clickOnType(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Event handler method for the Type combo box. It opens more options for reports depends on report type. (Options are location and machineID)
      Parameters:
      event - the action event that triggered the method call

    • clickOnLocation

      void clickOnLocation(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Event handler method for the Location combo box. It opens all the machines on specific location. Based on the Location that has been chosen.
      Parameters:
      event - the action event that triggered the method call

    • clickShowReport

      void clickShowReport(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent event)
      Event handler method for the Show Report button. Checking for wrong input when Month, Year, Type, Machine ID and Location are null. Set all necessary stuff for the report screen. Sends request to server to obtain the data it needs. Move to the next window depends on Report type: Inventory, Clients or Orders.
      Parameters:
      event - the mouse event that triggered the method call
